publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1108 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Upgrading of A1-That the Parliament supports the long-term upgrading of the A1 to dual carriageway status continuously from Edinburgh to the Borders at a time when it is the Department of Environment, Transport and the Regions' policy to upgrade the A1 from Newcastle to the Borders and in the interests of reducing casualties, improving communication, and increasing the economic competitiveness of south east Scotland and north east England. Supported by: David McLetchie*
S1M-1108 Upgrading of A1 (lodged on 21 July 2000) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-1108 Upgrading of A1 (lodged on 21 July 2000) Michael Russell*

S1M-1108 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Upgrading of A1-That the Parliament supports the long-term upgrading of the A1 to dual carriageway status continuously from Edinburgh to the Borders at a time when it is the Department of Environment, Transport and the Regions' policy to upgrade the A1 from Newcastle to the Borders and in the interests of reducing casualties, improving communication, and increasing the economic competitiveness of south east Scotland and north east England. Supported by: David McLetchie, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Michael Russell
S1M-1108 Upgrading of A1 (lodged on 21 July 2000) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1108 Upgrading of A1 (lodged on 21 July 2000) Alex Neil*
S1M-1108 Upgrading of A1 (lodged on 21 July 2000) Mr Keith Harding*

Supported by: David McLetchie, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Michael Russell, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Keith Harding, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-1108 Upgrading of A1 (lodged on 21 July 2000) Brian Adam*

Supported by: David McLetchie, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Michael Russell, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Keith Harding, Alasdair Morgan, Brian Adam
S1M-1108 Upgrading of A1 (lodged on 21 July 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-1108 Upgrading of A1 (lodged on 21 July 2000) Nick Johnston*
S1M-1108 Upgrading of A1 (lodged on 21 July 2000) Mr Brian Monteith*
